ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This package implements various estimators of entropy, such as the shrinkage estimator by Hausser and Strimmer, the maximum likelihood  and the Millow-Madow estimator, various Bayesian estimators, and the  Chao-Shen estimator.  It also offers an R interface to the NSB estimator. Furthermore, it provides functions for estimating Kullback-Leibler divergence, chi-squared, mutual information, and chi-squared statistic of independence. In addition there are functions for discretizing continuous random variables.

This package implements various estimators of entropy, such as the shrinkage estimator by Hausser and Strimmer, the maximum likelihood  and the Millow-Madow estimator, various Bayesian estimators, and the  Chao-Shen estimator.  It also offers an R interface to the NSB estimator. Furthermore, it provides functions for estimating Kullback-Leibler divergence, chi-squared, mutual information, and chi-squared statistic of independence. In addition there are functions for discretizing continuous random variables.

name: r-entropy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-entropy
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/entropy_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/entropy/entropy_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 901a2ade8f99b0c45c948cbc2fc792beef7346bc81de33987bb754da12ad76a5

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('entropy')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('entropy')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://strimmerlab.org/software/entropy/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: This package implements various estimators of entropy, such as the shrinkage estimator by Hausser and Strimmer, the maximum likelihood  and the Millow-Madow estimator, various Bayesian estimators, and the  Chao-Shen estimator.  It also offers an R interface to the NSB estimator. Furthermore, it provides functions
    for estimating Kullback-Leibler divergence, chi-squared, mutual information, and chi-squared statistic of independence. In addition there are functions for discretizing continuous random variables.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
